testcase.name: first-test.ta

error.message: Test Automation Engine error (non SUT) : method 'convert' from engine component of class 'org.squashtest.ta.plugin.commons.converter.FileToJavaCodeBundle' with argument 'org.squashtest.ta.framework.components.FileResource' has thrown an exception.
